lastSystemHealthFix.issue: Orchestrator repeatedly spawning fix-failing-pipeline alerts despite price-tracker working correctly
lastSystemHealthFix.rootCause: Old completed tasks (before 2025-12-09T04:00:00Z) lacked result.success field. Orchestrator's detectPriorities() counted these as failures, triggering false positive alerts even though fix was already deployed.
lastSystemHealthFix.fix: Cleaned schedule.json completedTasks array - removed 16 old tasks without proper result format. Now only tasks with { success: boolean } result format remain. This prevents false positives from polluting the 24h failure count.
lastSystemHealthFix.verification: Verified price-tracker pipeline running successfully. Last run: 2025-12-09T04:30:46Z with result.success=true. Cleaned completedTasks now contains only properly-formatted results.

price-drift-detector.reason: No edge in momentum chasing - academic research shows noise traders cause reversals, not continuation
price-drift-detector.note: Pipeline was intentionally killed, not failing. Removed from recurring schedule per strategic decision.

examples: Multiple hypotheses blocked by missing infrastructure
recurringFriction.addressedBy: Updated trade-research.md with execution bias and activation checklist

rootCausesIdentified: API response format varies (clobTokenIds as JSON string vs array)
Polymarket pages may require specific URL patterns
No clear workflow for promoting hypotheses to testing status

findings: Found unregistered daily-briefing pipeline - added as cap-009
4 capability gaps documented: automated-order-placement, volume-analysis, arbitrage-scanner, backtest-framework
6 agents missing post-session reflection template - added to all
trade-research lacked execution bias - added activation checklist and execution-first mindset
market-watcher lacked API fallback guidance - added
lastAgentReview.notes: First agent-review execution. All agent prompts now consistent with reflection protocol. Trade research should show improved hypothesis activation velocity.

lastBuildSprint.notes: Implemented pipeline scheduler reliability fix. Added RECURRING_PIPELINES config and ensurePipelinesScheduled() to daemon.ts. Daemon now verifies on every tick that all 7 recurring pipelines have pending tasks, auto-scheduling any that are missing. Also added price-tracker to the recurring pipeline list. This fixes the issue where pipelines could silently stop running if rescheduling failed.
